title: read only
extract: To change the read-only attribute, follow these steps: Right-click the file or folder icon. Remove the check mark by the Read Only item in the file's Properties dialog box. The attributes are found at the bottom of the General tab. Click OK.
extract_html: To change the read-only attribute, follow these steps: Right-click the file or folder icon. Remove the check mark by the Read Only item in the file's Properties dialog box. The attributes are found at the bottom of the General tab. Click OK.
